scripts.say: Were either of you hurt?
Oh... Oh my God! It's you! It's really you, Kawakaze!
Look, Mio! It's the real Kawakaze!
... What? I don't even get what just happened... But I guess we're saved now?
Squeeee! Look! Those cool eyes, that slender body, that fluffy tail! It's Kawakaze, in the flesh!
Calm down, Fubuki. You're making her uncomfortable.
So here you were. Glad to see you're both all right.
You're here too, Zuikaku?!
Sorry, where are my manners... Ahem, thank you for saving us when we were in danger.
You don't have any rigging from what I can see... But you've got cat ears and know our names... Are you from the Sakura Empire, by any chance?
Cat ears?! Excuse me, can't you see my tail? I'm a fox!
Oh, a fox? S-sorry!
It's no biggie. Anyway... I'm Shirakami Fubuki, the white-haired, animal-eared high-schooler working with Hololive. Many people mistake me for a cat, but I'm 100% a fox!
As for the reason why I know your names, well, that's a long story...
And I'm Ookami Mio, I also work with Hololive. I'm one of the Hologamers, if you want to be specific. Just call me Mio.
"Hololive"? Sounds like an organization, I guess...
I'm Zuikaku, Shoukaku-class aircraft carrier. And this is Kawakaze, Shiratsuyu-class destroyer.
Mhm, I know all about you. I made oaths with both of you, so how could I forget~
... I don't understand what you're talking about.
Seeing as you're unarmed, I assume you're civilians? Did you get caught in the bad weather?
This area's turned into a Mirror Sea and become infested with Sirens. It's really dangerous here, so you should stay close to us.
I honestly don't know how or why we ended up here... But I can say this place looks familiar.
As far as I can tell, this is the Hololive Server, or at least it was made to closely resemble it.
Hololive... server...?
Basically, it's like a secret base of ours. We often bring our friends here to build stuff or hang out.
A secret base? But there was never anything in this area prior to this...
We were just building stuff like usual, then this blinding light appeared outta nowhere... Next thing we know, a Siren fleet is attacking us, and our friends are nowhere to be seen...
... That sounds familiar.
I don't watch much TV, but isn't this like that "isekai anime" trope Ikazuchi mentioned before?
You know about that?!
Meh, wouldn't be the first time it's happened, so I get the gist of it.
Since you know our names, I can only assume we knew each other in the world you came from.
Hah-hah! I know a lot about Azur Lane, in fact!
This is giving me deja vu.
So from what I gather, the Sirens took us all to this place, which for some reason resembles your hideout before they took you here. Right?
Yeah, I guess so.
Fubuki, this'll take ages to explain, so how about we head to the safe house for now?
Safe house? What?
The place where we hid before we got taken here. Follow us and we'll take you there!
